cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on December 2, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6066, Strengthening the Office of Personnel Management Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 203 (Tuesday, November 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CONNOLLY:
H.R. 6066.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H6673]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 25 - 14.

title: Strengthening the Office of Personnel Management Act
